EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Toronto - Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Regional Training: VisiCAD 5.2 - Everything you need to know
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Complimentary Training: Everything You Need to Know About VisiCAD 5.2
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
We're coming to Canada to get you ready to move forward onto the latest version of VisiCAD. TriTech's VisiCAD 5.2 is filled with significant enhancements to enable an agency’s personnel to be more efficient and productive such as Advisor, Internet Integration, VisiNet Configuration, and much more. <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VisiCADRegionalTraining5dot2_Canada.pdf>
We hope that you will join us and fellow VisiCAD users in this intimate environment for an in-depth training session discussing the functionality, set up and system planning for VisiCAD 5.2. We're coming to you, so come ready - ready to learn, ready to ask questions and ready to move to VisiCAD 5.2!
Agenda:
9:00 AM - 12:00 NOON VisiCAD 5.2 Functionality and Demonstration
12:00 NOON - 1:00 PM Complimentary Lunch will be provided
1:00 PM - 4:00 PM System Planning and Question and Answer Session with Technical Services
Register here: http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_TorontoRegistration.html <http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_TorontoRegistration.html>
**Note: Training will focus solely on VisiCAD. VisiNet Mobile will NOT be covered.
Questions? Sally Olson-Nelson TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7358
Training Details Register to Save Your Seat Date: Thursday, November 29
Time: 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Location: Holiday Inn Express - Vaughan 6100 Highway 7 Vaughan, Ontario Canada L4H 0R2 (905) 851-1510
Bonus: Light continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.
Cost: Complimentary
<http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_TorontoRegistration.html>
